extendedInfo.description: Receive and pay bills on your Android for FREE with the largest consumer electronic bill & payment provider â MyCheckFree - your Personal Online Bill Payment Center Receive paperless e-bills and quickly make electronic payments to hundreds of local and national companies including utilities, insurance companies, credit cards, cable and satellite providers and more.  View amount due, due dates and bill details on your phone or computer.â¢	Receive email notifications when new e-bills are availableâ¢	Every payment carries a 100% guarantee for safe, secure deliveryâ¢	Save time and money - no checks, no stamps, no hassleâ¢	Choose the exact date you want your bills to be paid and make payments quickly and easily â¢	Simple, streamlined interface â¢	Your information automatically syncs across devices, so you have your latest information at your fingertips whether you access your account from the web or your Androidâ¢	Your data and payment information is safe and secure with proven processing capabilities of an industry-leading billing and payments provider  Gain greater control over your finances with your personalized MyCheckFree App.  You can view, pay, and track your bills from one, central place. All of your monthly bill information - right at your fingertips!Learn more at www.MyCheckFree.com*Terms and Conditions apply

reviews.comment: Have used this app for years!  One of the dust of its kind--top notch!\tQuick, convenient, free... and now an app on my phone=perfection!
reviews.author: Helena Jach

reviews.title: Good for me.
reviews.comment: I have been using this service on the pc for years and it has helped me greatly.just put it on phone.thanks.
reviews.author: Angelia F. Simon

reviews.comment: Love the app. I\'ve been using website since 2004 without any issues. Able to view PDF without issue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would give 5.
reviews.comment: Love the app, just wish that they would remember me. Plz fix. I have to sign in everytime I use it.
reviews.author: Charhonda Sillers

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Need to be able to move to SD card.
reviews.author: Harold Ecton

reviews.title: Will not respond to keyboard
reviews.comment: Unusable. This app has problems recognizing keyboard entry if either login and/or password. As I type,  it does not seem to be receiving the key presses. Android v4.1.1 on Samsung Note 2.
reviews.author: Aho Haux

reviews.title: Cannot view bill, even though Reader is installed
reviews.comment: I can pay bills just fine, but I can\'t view the actual bill, which makes the app useless. I need to see my bill to determine how much I want to pay, how much I have left to pay, and how much credit I have. It keeps saying I have to install Adobe Reader...which I already have. Please fix asap,
reviews.author: Hannah Schnabel

reviews.title: HTC Sensation 4.2.2
reviews.comment: Agree with most others. Cannot access bill view, cannot access settings without crash. Looks the same as it did in the mobile browser. Only the options in browser worked. Alpha test app at best.
reviews.author: Jason Zearfaus

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Ok app. Crashes on settings and can\'t view bills.  Ashley from fi Serve- every one here is having a crash on settings menu and every one is having issues viewing bills.  Not sure how YOU can not recreate the issues Pay bill feature however works so that is good
reviews.author: Shrikrishna Marathe

reviews.comment: Can\'t view bills, even after installing Adobe Reader
reviews.author: Gregory Weiss

reviews.title: Works great on my droid DNA
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for paying the electric bill.  Its fast and easy.
reviews.author: Nick Wallace

reviews.title: Not Fully Working
reviews.comment: Cannot open bills only see summaries.
reviews.author: Eric Frick

reviews.title: Disappointment
reviews.comment: Cannot pay with a credit card. Please fix.
reviews.author: robert hohnhorst

reviews.title: Alpha quality at best
reviews.comment: Accessing settings reliably crashes app.  Bill view seems to be redirecting to a web page designed for PCs (AEB instructions to right-click a toolbar)...does not display bill...unusable for that.  Speed not much better than mobile site.
reviews.author: AnonymousDog

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Can\'t view ebills. When I select settings, app crashes. I have an HTC EVO on Sprint
reviews.author: Alex Segal

reviews.title: Only initially allowed login,  now useless?
reviews.comment: Cannot log in after initial use. Pasword entry fails.
reviews.author: Ashutosh Mehndiratta

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Hopefully the icon design will be updated soon to properly show on dark wallpapers. Other than that the app works great!
reviews.author: Donn Allan Adolfo

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: Works perfectly on my galaxy s3
reviews.author: cynthia delgado

reviews.title: Logs out right awat
reviews.comment: You log in and it times you out instantly.  Get it fixed I want ro use it plz.
reviews.author: Colin Peterson

reviews.title: Session timed out...
reviews.comment: I get a message that my session timed out every time I login.
reviews.author: Chris Rinearson
